examples/doc.php
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * Compare jQuery documentation to QueryPath documentation
00004  *
00005  * 
00006  * @author Emily Brand
00007  * @license LGPL The GNU Lesser GPL (LGPL) or an MIT-like license.
00008  * @see http://api.jquery.com/api/
00009  * 
00010  * TODO: add to the xml file
00011  */
00012 
00013 require_once '../src/QueryPath/QueryPath.php';
00014 
00015 /**
00016  * Add the link & class to each key to show in the left div.
00017  * 
00018  * @param String $v
00019  */
00020 function addClasses($v) {
00021   return "<a href='".$_SERVER['PHP_SELF']."?key=$v'><span class='keyname'>$v</span></a><br />";
00022 }
00023 
00024 // The document skeleton
00025 $qpdoc = htmlqp('doc.html', 'body');
00026 
00027 $key = $_GET['key'];
00028 
00029 // The jQuery categories that are used in QueryPath
00030 $qparray = array('Tree Traversal', 'Child Filter', 'Attribute', 'Content Filter', 'Basic Filter', 
00031 'Hierarchy', 'Basic', 'Filtering', 'Miscellaneous Traversing', 'DOM Insertion, Outside', 
00032 'DOM Insertion, Inside', 'Attributes', 'Style Properties');
00033 
00034 $jqnames = array();
00035 $qpnames = array();
00036 
00037 // Search through the xml file to find any entries of jQuery entities
00038 foreach(qp('querypath.xml', 'entry') as $entry) {
00039   $qpnames[$entry->attr('name')] =  
00040       array('desc' => $entry->find('desc')->innerXML(), 
00041             'jquery' => $entry->parent()->find('jquery')->innerXML(), 
00042             'querypath' => $entry->parent()->find('querypath')->innerXML());
00043 }
00044 
00045 // Search through the xml file to find all entries of jQuery entities
00046 foreach(htmlqp('http://api.jquery.com/api/', 'entry') as $entry) {
00047   $category = false;
00048   $category = array_search($entry->find('category:first')->attr('name'), $qparray);
00049   while($entry->next('category')->html() != null) {
00050     $category = (array_search($entry->attr('name'), $qparray)) ? true : $category;
00051     if($category) break;
00052   }
00053   if($category) {
00054     $jqnames[$entry->parent()->attr('name')] =  
00055       array('longdesc' => $entry->find('longdesc')->innerXML(), 
00056             'name' => $entry->parent()->find('category')->attr('name'));
00057   }
00058 }
00059 
00060 // Map the keys & sort them
00061 $jqkeys = array_keys($jqnames);
00062 $jqkeys = array_map("addClasses", $jqkeys);
00063 sort($jqkeys);
00064 
00065 // Add the keys to the nav bar
00066 $qpdoc->find('#leftbody');
00067 foreach($jqkeys as $k => $v) {
00068   $qpdoc->append($v);
00069 }
00070 
00071 // Add the description to the main window if the key exists
00072 if(array_key_exists($key, $jqnames)) {
00073   if(array_key_exists($key, $qpnames)) {
00074     $qpdoc->top()->find('#rightfunction')->text('Function: '.ucfirst($key));
00075     $qpdoc->top()->find('#rightdesc')->text($qpnames[$key]['desc']);
00076     $qpdoc->top()->find('#righttitle')->text('How it\'s done in jQuery');
00077     $qpdoc->top()->find('#righttext')->text($qpnames[$key]['jquery']);
00078     $qpdoc->top()->find('#righttitle2')->text('How it\'s done in QueryPath');
00079     $qpdoc->top()->find('#righttext2')->text($qpnames[$key]['querypath']);
00080   }
00081   else {
00082     $qpdoc->top()->find('#rightfunction')->text('Function: '.ucfirst($key));
00083     $qpdoc->top()->find('#rightdesc')->remove();
00084     $qpdoc->top()->find('#righttitle')->text('jQuery Documentation');
00085     $qpdoc->top()->find('#righttext')->append($jqnames[$key]['longdesc']);
00086   }
00087 }
00088 
00089 // Write the document
00090 $qpdoc->writeHTML();
00091
